name: Dragunity Glow
text: Add 1 Level 5 or higher "Dragunity" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone equipped to a "Dragunity" monster; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Dragunity Glow" once per turn.
